name: RED-23
description:
LD JAM 42: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/red-23

LET US KNOW IN THE COMMENT YOUR BEST SCORE!

CONTROLS:

  • ARROW KEYS to move
  • LEFT CLICK to attack
  • RIGHT CLICK to dash

Discover a gloomy planet where flesh monsters reproduced… A lot!

RED-23 is a HACK N SLASH:

Slash and dash your way to extermination.

We’re 3 to create the game,

Louis : Prog

Alex : Pixel art

Arthur : Sound design

THE THEME: Our bias is more artistic than litteral: You can run but you can’t really flee, we feel like RED-23 has a claustrophobic ambiance and overwhelming visuals and sounds.

Let you swallow by the swarm. You won’t be able to breath among this mass of foes… You can evolve on a huge map, where flesh nests will more and more spawn. If they’re close enough, they’ll be able to connect through their veins. That will allow them to evolve (monsters will grow stronger), also, these veins will block your path.
